# List of awards and nominations received by Brandon Flowers

}}
These are the awards and nominations received by American musician, Brandon Flowers.

The AltRock Awards are presented annually by the American radio station i99Radio.

Ivor Novello Awards
The Ivor Novello Awards are awarded for songwriting and composing. The awards, named after the Cardiff born entertainer Ivor Novello, are presented annually in London by The Ivors Academy (formerly known as British Academy of Songwriters, Composers and Authors (BASCA)).
